about.subtitle: About Us
about.title: MUKHAMMADIYEV OTABEK SOBIROVICH IS THE HEAD OF THE ENTERPRISE
about.desc: BAKHMAL PLOTS's mandate is to raise levels of nutrition, improve agricultural productivity, better the lives of rural populations and contribute to the growth of the world economy. Achieving food security for all is at the heart of BAKHMAL PLOTS's efforts â€“ to make sure people have regular access to enough high-quality food to lead active, healthy lives.

service.subtitle: Service
service.title: Our Farm Services
service.desc: We have many years of experience in the supply of quality products and goods in the field of agriculture. We have a strong team and we are constantly introducing new technologies to agriculture.

items.title: Fresh Vegetables
items.desc: Discover a wide variety of freshly harvested vegetables bursting with flavor and nutrients.

items.title: Fresh Fruits
items.desc: Indulge in the juiciest and ripest fruits, straight from our orchards to your table.

items.title: Healty Cattle
items.desc: Our ethically raised and well-cared-for cattle guarantee high-quality, nutritious meat for your family.

items.title: Modern Truck
items.desc: Experience efficiency and reliability with our state-of-the-art trucks, ensuring prompt and safe delivery.

items.title: Farming Plans
items.desc: Find expertly crafted farming plans tailored to optimize productivity and sustainability on your farm.
